detail_desc: Jumper knitted in soft chenille with long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short coat in a sturdy wool blend with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and flap front pockets. Dropped shoulders and wide sleeves with pleats at the cuffs. Lined.
Sports trousers in sturdy jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, print motif on one leg, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif. Drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jacket in soft pile with front pockets, a hood with ear appliqués on top, and a zip down the front with a chin guard.

Puffer jacket in a quilted weave made from recycled polyester with a stand-up collar and detachable, fleece-lined hood. Zip down the front with a ring pull and a chin guard at the top, and flap front pockets. Narrow elastication around the hood and cuffs. Lined.
Coat in a felted wool blend with a tie belt at the waist. Small stand-up collar, side pockets, no fasteners and a single back vent. Unlined.
Fitted top in soft, ribbed viscose jersey with a small collar, long sleeves and overlocked edges at the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Mules with open toes, leather linings and insoles, and covered heels approx. 2.5 cm.
Polo shirt in hole-patterned premium cotton jersey with a ribbed collar, button placket and ribbed trims around the sleeves and hem.
Vest tops in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and armholes.
Necklace of thin metal chains with small pendants. Adjustable length 42-48 cm.
Patterned swim top with a small stand-up collar, long raglan sleeves and elasticated hem.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a regular waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with flutter sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist with decorative gathers.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details. Loose fit with an extra-high waist, zip fly and button and gently tapered legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

Wrapover blouse in a crinkled weave made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend. Short, puffy raglan sleeves with gathers along the shoulder seams and narrow elastication at the hems. Seam at the waist with visible ties at one side and concealed ties at the other. Lined.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a turned-up hem. Fleece lining.
Metal hoop earrings in various designs. One pair is decorated with rhinestones and four pairs have pendants.
Soft, non-wired bra in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Fine-knit ankle socks in a cotton blend with wide elastication at the top.
Skinny-fit treggings in superstretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Marled suit trousers woven in a wool blend with an extended waistband with a button and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Zip fly, pockets in the side seams, welt back pockets with a button and slightly shorter legs with creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a yoke and short sleeves in stretch lace.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
V-neck jumper in a rib knit with a wrapover front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Multi-strand, thin metal chain necklace. Adjustable length, 47.5 to 56 cm.
Short swim shorts in woven fabric made from recycled polyester with an elasticated, drawstring waist and discreet side pockets. Soft mesh inner shorts. One pair is patterned.
Jumper in a soft, loose knit with a V-neck, long raglan sleeves and roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a chest pocket.
Calf-length culottes in a recycled polyester weave. Regular waist with elastication at the back and pleats at the front, diagonal side pockets and wide, straight legs.
Pyjamas in printed cotton jersey. T-shirt top with a round neckline. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a round neckline that has a small opening and concealed button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves and cuffs with two buttons. Unlined.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft jersey with long sleeves, and press-studs down the front and along one leg. The cotton content of the pyjamas is organic.
Shorts in an airy, crinkled nylon blend. High waist with wide smocking and a small frill trim, side pockets and wide legs.
Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. One shoulder strap with a wide, flounced trim. No fasteners.
Wide jumper in a fine knit with a lightly brushed finish. Stand-up collar, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, grosgrain button band with concealed fasteners and gently rounded hem.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a print motif and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Fitted, short-sleeved top in soft jersey made from a modal blend with a V-neck and decorative knot detail at the front.
Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in soft, stretch denim with a ribbed, elasticated drawstring waist, side and back pockets, fake fly and tapered legs with decorative seams and elasticated hems.
Trainers with lacing at the front, mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs with raw-edge hems. Low waist with a wide, elasticated panel at the front and concealed, adjustable elastication in the waistband so the waist width can be adjusted allowing the jeans to be worn both during pregnancy and afterwards.
Shorts in an airy weave. High, frill-trimmed paper bag waist with covered elastication, a zip fly and buttons, and flap leg pockets.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Short, straight-cut dress in a viscose and linen weave with a collar, deep V-neck and decorative diagonal buttoning down the front. Short, wide sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Lined, non-wired bikini top with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable, flounce-trimmed shoulder straps, and ties at the back.
Double-layered hat in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a small, sewn-on appliqué at the front of the hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Sleeveless dress in a crinkled, patterned weave with a V-neck front and back. Sewn-in wrapover and concealed press-stud at the front, double flounce around the neckline, ties across the back of the neck and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Short-sleeved top in shimmering, transparent mesh. Unlined.
Knee-length coat in woven fabric with wide notch lapels, a detachable tie belt at the waist, decorative tab at the cuffs and side pockets. No buttons. Lined.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with a scarf detail.
Blouse in an airy weave with a deep V-neck, double-layered panel at the front and gathered yoke at the back. Long sleeves, wide cuffs with covered buttons, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Dungaree shorts in soft, organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket and adjustable straps with press-studs at the front. Soft brushed inside.
Short-sleeved nightdresses in soft, printed cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Imitation leather trainers with embroidery, a lightly padded top edge, lacing at the front and a shimmering metallic detail at the heel. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs at the sides and crotch.
Short lace shorts with an elasticated waist and scalloped hems. Jersey lining.

Block-coloured jacket in fleece with a nylon upper section and a fleece-lined hood with an elastic drawstring. Zip down the front, zipped chest and side pockets and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. The pocket linings are made from recycled polyester.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey made from cotton and silk.
Top in soft pile with a kangaroo pocket and hood with an elastic drawstring. Long sleeves with concealed elastication at the cuffs, and an elastic drawstring at the hem.
Fitted vest top in ribbed cotton jersey with a square neckline front and back.
Lace balconette bra with underwired, lightly padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Narrow, adjustable, detachable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Jersey pyjamas. Long-sleeved top with ribbed cuffs. Leggings with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Lace thong briefs with a lined gusset and string back.
Shorts in cotton twill with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and raw-edge frayed hems.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey.
Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif, round neckline, short sleeves and a rounded hem.
Tights in a soft, rib knit with an elasticated waist.
Sleeveless dress in airy, patterned chiffon with gathers at the top and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist and a skirt that is longer at the back. Lined.
Jersey trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist, patch front pockets and elasticated hems.
